mapper.select: SELECT c.product_number AS productNumber, cart_quantity AS cartQuantity, p.product_name AS productName, image_src AS img, member_address1 AS memberAddress1, member_address2 AS memberAddress2, member_name AS memberName, member_phone AS memberPhone, member_postal AS memberPostal, member_email AS memberEmail FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_number = p.product_number INNER JOIN image i ON c.product_number = i.product_number AND image_order = 1 INNER JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberID};
